posts.post_content:
I have several Harper's woodcuts for sale. Please see high resolution scans for condition. All prices include priority shipping with delivery confirmation. 
Payment via Paypal Gift or Money Owed.

Strong price drop on remaining woodcuts and will further discount for multiple items purchased as follows:

Buy 2 get an extra $5 off
Buy 3 get an extra $10 off
Buy 4 get an extra $15 off
..............

If you can find them cheaper anywhere else, I encourage you to buy them.

Bump for updated inventory and additional discounts.
PM sent on Unins of Morrisiana---Jay
All emails/PM's have been responded to and inventory list has been updated with some additional price drops. If these don't sell, I'm putting them back in my ITOYA Folder :D
Those itoya folders are fantastic. I have everything in them, from cards (in sheets) to posters.
I completely agree Doug! I've found that the 8 1/2" x 11" are great for T3's, many cabinets and other random stuff :)
Only 2 prints left! The Ewing cover is a full publication. I'll take $105 for both.
